topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu daria cinco, mas no final da minha revis√£o s√≥ posso dar 4 estrelas. A segunda tentativa de ir ao museu foi √≥tima. topComments.author: Leah Sapphira
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Participamos durante o recesso escolar. Existem v√°rias oportunidades para entrar no Free e essa foi uma delas.  Exclusivamente para esta semana foi um caderno de desenho com l√°pis de cor e uma bolsa para coloc√°-los para as crian√ßas. Meus filhos gostaram muito deles.  Para as crian√ßas h√° uma nova experi√™ncia de RV que foi fant√°stica! Isso fez minha filha interagir com a arte e quando ela completou as tarefas ela queria usar meu telefone para tirar fotos de tudo... Ent√£o eu tenho uma tonelada de fotos da perspectiva de uma crian√ßa de 6 anos em anexo... Divirta-se!  (Original) We attended during school break. There are a number of opportunities to get in Free and this was one of them.  Uniquely to this week was a sketch book with colored pencils and a pouch to put them in for the kids. My kids really enjoyed them.  For the kids there is a new VR experience that was fantastic! It made my daughter interact with the art and when she completed the tasks she wanted to use my phone to take pictures of everything... So I have a ton of from the perspective of a 6 year old pictures attached... Enjoy!

topComments.author: Alexandr Deliu
topComments.comment: Amazing art museum! Easy to get lost and staff is super helpful. However the exhibits feel well curated and were thought provoking. Easy to spend HOURS here

topComments.author: Rizelle Vergara
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitado durante o Festival do Ano Novo Chin√™s, a entrada era gratuita e inclu√≠a acesso ao museu! Foi divertido e eles tinham atividades interativas boas para fam√≠lias como fazer lanternas, etc. A √°rea do jardim era muito bom. Vou precisar verificar os eventos noturnos e mais do museu na pr√≥xima vez. Aten√ß√£o, eles exigem uma prova de vacina√ß√£o COVID (mesmo apenas uma prova de foto) ou um teste COVID negativo de 72 horas e acredito que voc√™ seja obrigado a fazer um pr√©-registro em seu site.  (Original) Visited during the Chinese New Year Festival so admission was free and included museum access! It was fun and they had interactive activities good for families like lantern making, etc. The garden area was really nice. I will need to check out the night events and more of the museum next time. Heads up, they do require to show proof of COVID vaccination (even just photo proof) or a 72hr negative COVID test and I believe you are required to pre register on their website.

Each time, I‚Äôm impressed by the vast exhibits of Georgia O‚ÄôKeefe or Frieda Khalo. Always happy to see what they have on display. The outdoor garden is a delight and so is the cafe. I‚Äôve had the burger and salad, both terrific.

topComments.author: Andrew P
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s est√°vamos l√° para 'Art after Dark', onde diferentes artistas podem fazer suas coisas! - ouviu Jazz no Grand Hall - fant√°stico btw - perambulou pelo jardim de esculturas e sal√µes de arte - Museu √© um pouco compacto, mas um espa√ßo bonito - durante o acesso 'Art after Dark' √© um pouco limitado, pois nem todas as exposi√ß√µes podem ser visualizadas - restaurante e bar estavam lotados, precisa ir comer l√° na pr√≥xima visita - √≥tima desculpa para ter que voltar ao vinho e jantar l√°!!!  (Original) We were there for ‚ÄòArt after Dark‚Äô where different artists get to do their thing! - listened to Jazz in the Grand Hall - fantastic btw - wandered through the sculpture garden and art halls - Museum is somewhat compact, but a beautiful space - during ‚ÄòArt after Dark‚Äô access is somewhat limited in that not all exhibits can be viewed - restaurant and bar were packed, need to go eat there next visit - great excuse to have to return to wine and dine there!!!

topComments.author: Kelly King
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Para uma cidade pequena (embora seja a maior do Condado), este √© um enorme museu de arte, algo que voc√™ poderia encontrar em uma cidade muito maior. A recente expans√£o deles colocou muito mais arte para exibi√ß√£o e a propriedade tem um fluxo muito melhor do que eu me lembro. As salas de aula e os programas s√£o realmente maravilhosos e a extravag√¢ncia come√ßa na porta da frente e continua por toda parte. Tive a alegria e o prazer de visitar o Norton e fiquei maravilhada com o qu√£o longe eu fui desde que eu era um jovem adulto aprendendo arte.  (Original) For a small city (even though it's the biggest in the County) this is a huge art museum, something you might find at a much larger city.  Their recent expansion put much more art out for viewing and the property has much better flow than I remember.  The classrooms and programs are really wonderful and the whimsy begins at the front door and continues throughout.  I was amused and delighted to visit the Norton and marveled at how far it has come since I was a young adult learning about art.

topComments.author: Portia O

topComments.author: Syra Ozaeta
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia maravilhosa... Fui ver a exposi√ß√£o de Frida Kahlo e Diego Rivera com minha fam√≠lia no fim de semana de 21 de novembro e foi uma explos√£o. Recomendo a visita porque, al√©m da incr√≠vel exibi√ß√£o de Frida, havia a exposi√ß√£o chinesa e a da di√°spora. N√≥s realmente quer√≠amos experimentar o restaurante, mas estava cheio at√© a borda e, ao passar, a comida parecia incr√≠vel, n√£o posso dizer sobre o sabor porque, infelizmente, n√£o pude experimentar. N√£o entendo por que as pessoas ficam t√£o acaloradas com o museu pedindo texto negativo ou cart√£o de vacina, n√£o gosta, ent√£o n√£o v√° üôÑ foi um √≥timo lugar e com certeza voltarei.  (Original) Wonderful experience.... Went to see the Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera exhibit with my family over the weekend  November 21 and it was a blast. Highly recommend to go visit because aside from the awesome Frida display was the Chinese exhibit and the diaspora one. We really wanted to try the restaurant but was filled to the brim and on passing the food looked amazing,can't say about flavor because unfortunately I wasn't able to try. Don't understand why people get so heated over the museum asking for negative text or vaccine card, don't like it then don't goüôÑwas a great place and will definitely be back.
